title: Large Facebook Option Traders Dumping Calls Following Difficult Week
text: Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) shares are now up 11% year to date. On Friday, the largest of a series of Facebook option trades were more bearish than bullish, suggesting smart money is taking profits on Facebook’s recent run.

title: How the Future of Retail Favors Facebook Stock
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) is one of the most trafficked sites on the internet, and it has only gotten busier since the coronavirus pandemic hit.

title: Biden Blasts Facebook — As He Spends Record Amount On Facebook Ads
text: The paradox reveals how crucial the candidate believes the social media platform is to winning in 2020.

title: Facebook's Giphy Deal Getting a Once-Over by UK Regulators
text: UK's Competition and Markets Authority wants Facebook and Giphy to stop integrating until it finishes its inquiry.

title: Facebook’s $400 million Giphy acquisition facing UK scrutiny
text: Facebook’s recent acquisition of Giphy is facing scrutiny across the pond. The social networking giant last month announced that it was buying the popular GIF-slinger in a deal worth $400 million with the intention of more closely integrating it with its own family of apps, setting off alarm bells for Britain’s competition watchdog.

title: Here’s Why Facebook Stock Will Ride Out Yet Another Storm
text: Facebook again is at the center of controversy. But past scandals haven't dented FB stock.

title: Facebook hit by antitrust scrutiny after buying a site for GIFs
text: Facebook is once again drawing scrutiny from regulators -- but this time, it's for buying a search engine sometimes used to find GIFs of John Travolta and dumpster fires.

title: Zuckerberg, Chan says they're disgusted by Trump's 'incendiary' posts on Facebook
text: Some scientists funded by the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative are calling for Facebook to do better.

title: Facebook Is Getting Into Venture Capital
text: Investing in startups is the social-networking giant's latest method of staying ahead of the curve.

title: Facebook's Giphy deal is being probed by the UK's competition watchdog
text: The U.K.'s Competition and Markets Authority announced that it has launched an investigation into Facebook's acquisition of Giphy.

title: UK competition watchdog launches investigation into Facebook’s $400M acquisition of Giphy
text: Facebook wants to be the go-to platform for all of your social needs, but a big move it made last month to take ownership in the world of GIFs — the short, looping videos that people use to convey sentiments in online conversations — may not go as it hopes. The UK Competition and Markets […]

title: Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan say they were disgusted by Trump's 'incendiary rhetoric' on Facebook
text: In a response to scientists funded by the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative (CZI), the Facebook billionaires wrote they were "deeply shaken and disgusted by President Trump's divisive and incendiary rhetoric."
